game.beginning: The year is 2256, and humanity has colonized several planets in the distant reaches of the galaxy.
game.ending: After discovering an ancient alien technology that holds the key to infinite energy, the player must make a choice between using it for the greater good or personal gain.
game.synopsis:
In "Echoes of Eternity," players take on the role of an explorer who has stumbled upon an abandoned research facility on a remote planet. As they delve deeper into the ruins, they begin to uncover the secrets of a long-lost civilization that possessed technology far beyond their own.

The player soon discovers that the alien technology has been left behind as a test for potential users. The player must navigate through the ancient structure, solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles to reach the core of the facility.

However, upon reaching the center of the facility, the player is met with a choice: use the energy source for the benefit of humanity or keep it for themselves. This decision will have far-reaching consequences, shaping the fate of the galaxy and determining whether the player becomes a hero or a villain.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
